Class: TransformProcessor

TransformProcessor

Transform Processor

new TransformProcessor ()

Transform processor is the swiss army knife of processors. It leverages the power of MongoDB aggregation framework to transform / filter / aggregate data in every posible way.

It uses internally the fabulous Mingo (https://github.com/kofrasa/mingo) module, an in-memory MongoDB query language implementation.

Extends

  • Processor

Methods

configure (cfg, callback) inherited overrides

Configures a component. It's the first method that is called in order to initialize the compoment
Name Type Description
cfg object Configuration options
callback function Callback function

key (callback) inherited overrides

Generates a key for an entry. This key is only descriptive, a way to show "how" an entry is identified by a component
Name Type Description
callback function Callback function

pause (callback) inherited overrides

Pauses a component. When a component is paused, no data will be sent, but pending data can be processed
Name Type Description
callback function Callback function

process (entry, callback) inherited overrides

Process a data entry
Name Type Description
entry object Data entry
callback function Callback function. Called when entry has been fully processed

push (entry, callback) inherited overrides

Generates new entries from the currently being processed one
Name Type Description
entry Object New data entry being generated
callback function This callback is called when the flow accepts the new entry

resume (callback) inherited overrides

Resumes a component previously paused. When resumed, component start receiving more data
Name Type Description
callback function Callback function

start (cfg, callback) inherited overrides

Starts a component
Name Type Description
cfg object Configuration options
callback function Callback function

stop (callback) inherited overrides

Stops the component. This is a finalization method, meaning the the component must free all resources in order to stop the engine
Name Type Description
callback function Callback function
